section.title: Customizing Lingo for &DCS;
section.para: To run the &DCS; with custom attributes of the Lingo clustering algorithm:

listitem.para: Use the &DCW; to save the attribute set XML file with the desired Lingo attribute values.

Replace the contents of lingo.attributes.xml, located in the WEB-INF/classes/suites directory of the DCS WAR file, located in the war/ of the DCS distribution, with the XML file saved in the previous step.

section.para: You can use the same procedure to customize other algorithms, e.g. STC.
